Another good use for Ulysses Sheets

January 31, 2016

Ben Brooks highlighted another good use of the Sheets feature in Ulysses for building his email newsletter.

I use Sheets for my course writing for Mijingo so I can reorder course sections as needed. I donâ€™t merge them all together like Ben does for his newsletter, instead opting to only glue them together. This gives me a better overview of the course sections.
